negotiator.protocol

Class AlternatingOfferConsensusProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.protocol.ProtocolAdapter
      • negotiator.protocol.AlternatingOfferConsensusProtocol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Protocol

    public class AlternatingOfferConsensusProtocol
extends ProtocolAdapter
    Implementation of an alternating offer protocol using voting consensus.

    Protocol: 

     Round 1: Each agent makes their own offer.
 Round 2: Each agent votes (accept/reject) for each offer on the table.

 If there is one offer that everyone accepts, the negotiation end with this offer.
 Otherwise, the process continues until reaching deadline or agreement.

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished(Session session,
                 java.util.List<NegotiationParty> parties)
        Check if the protocol is done or still busy. If this method returns true, the SessionManager will not start a new .Round after the current one. It will however finish all the turns described in the getRoundStructure(java.util.List, negotiator.session.Session) method.
